p: UV-Vis spectrophotometry (DR/5000 UV-Vis HACH, Hach Company, Loveland, CO, USA) at 253.5 nm was used to quantify the essential oil of the Z. riedelianum fruits [ 34, 79, 80]. The calibration curve were obtained based on the concentrations 0.05, 0.10, 0.15, 0.20, 0.25, and 0.30 mg/mL of essential oil in hexane.
